Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Simplify ingest API response to return internal order IDs

- Switch from createMany to individual creates to capture IDs
- Return orderId, success, and errorMessage \(on failure only\)
- Check for existing orders to prevent duplicates

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add drag-and-drop reordering for boxes

Replace numeric priority input with visual drag-and-drop ordering:
- Add @dnd-kit/core and @dnd-kit/sortable for DnD functionality
- Create SortableBoxRow component with drag handle
- Add reorder-boxes API action for persisting order
- Remove priority input from box edit form
- Add helper text explaining drag-to-reorder behavior

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add debug endpoint for product/box diagnostics

GET /api/debug/products returns:
- All product sizes with their singleBoxId values
- All boxes with priority and singleCupOnly flags
- Summary of how many sizes have singleBoxId set

Use this to verify database state matches UI display.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Make Orders by Size page dynamic based on box config

- Remove hardcoded pack sizes \(2/4, 4/5, 6/10, Custom\)
- Fetch boxes from /api/box-config dynamically
- Filter buttons now show actual box names from database
- Show order counts per box in filter buttons
- Use suggestedBox.boxName from orders \(already calculated at ingest\)
- Add "No Box" filter for orders without box assignment
- Show confidence level \(Confirmed/Calculated/Unknown\) in table
- Remove dependency on pack-config.json
- Single-cup boxes shown with purple dot indicator

Adding/changing boxes in Box Config now automatically updates this page.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add color columns, box confirmation dialog, and UI improvements

- Add Color column to Singles, Orders by Size, and Order Details
- Simplify color extraction to use NetSuite color field directly
- Add clickable box confirmation from All Orders and Orders by Size pages
- Add BoxConfirmDialog for confirming/changing box assignments inline
